title: Schizophrenic

fields.name: Stabbing:
fields.value: Attack a player with your current Attack Power.

fields.name: Take the Plunge (x1):
fields.value: Attack and kill a player with 1.5x Attack Power. After using this ability, your Attack Power increases to 1.5x and your Defense Power increases to 1.4x.

fields.name: What They Say (Passive):
fields.value: Each Evening after you use Take the Plunge,  the dead may vote on who you attack. The dead fully control your attack if you scored below 50% in the Evening Phase. Otherwise, you will learn the target chosen by the dead and will rampage if you attack that target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: 3 or fewer players, including you, are alive, and there are no other Neutral Killing roles alive.

desc:
Post 182
*You. They're telling me- it's you!* (Inspired by Muller's Goodfellas Mafia)
